'''Franco''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A member of the [Adragan Adventuring Company](/adraganAdventuringCompany/), Franco is a Darcozzi Paladin and a part-time chanter (though his mates agree he lacks the necessary talent).

## Interactions
